metadata.title: CVE-2020-22015 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in FFmpeg 4.2 in mov_write_video_tag due to the out of bounds in libavformat/movenc.c, which could let a remote malicious user obtain sensitive information, cause a Denial of Service, or execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
